document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">He </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">sees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Shine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">best </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Fling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">up </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Balls </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Gold </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Cubit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">play </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">every </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Crescent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">hold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Elate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Acre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Atom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">swim </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Second's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">right </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">Race </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: My God he sees thee
